file.name: public-feed-api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1 info: title: "NAV ads public API" description: "This API provides published data about available jobs in Norway and information on employers\n For more documentation and the public API-key, please visit our Github page [PAM Public Feed](https://github.com/navikt/pam-public-feed/)" termsOfService: "https://datanorge.no" contact: email: "plattform.for.arbeidsmarkedet@nav.no" version: '1' license: name: "MIT" servers: - url: 'https://arbeidsplassen.nav.no' paths: /public-feed/api/v1/ads: get: summary: "Fetches job ads" description: "Fetches a paged list of job ads parameters" parameters: - name: "page" in: "query" description: "Page number" required: false schema: type: "integer" - name: "size" in: "query" description: "Page size" required: false schema: type: "integer" - name: "published" in: "query" description: | Filter ads published on a certain date/time or within a date/time range. Ranges should be surrounded with either parenthesis or brackets. Parenthesis indicates that the value should be non-inclusive, brackets indicate that it should be inclusive. Dates should be separated with comma. Date format is either 'yyyy-MM-dd' or 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss'. Examples could be: '[2019-06-12T23:00:01,2019-06-14]', '[2019-06-12,2019-06-13)', '[2019-06-12,2019-06-13)', '2019-06-12'. A wildcard date (e.g. infinitely far into the future or the past) is represented by an asterisk '*'. Example: '[*,2019-06-01)' will match all ads published before June of 2019, while [2019-06-01,*) will match all ads published on or after June of 2019. Some literals are also supported, like 'today', 'tomorrow' and 'yesterday' for dates. And 'now' indicating the current date and time. required: false schema: type: "string" - name: "updated" in: "query" description: | Filter ads updated on a certain date/time or within date/time range. See description of 'published'-filter for the date range syntax. required: false schema: type: "string" - name: "uuid" in: "query" description: "fetch an ad with a specific uuid" required: false schema: type: "string" - name: "source" in: "query" description: | Only fetch ads from a specific source, or not from a specific source if prefixed with "!". "SBL" will fetch ads from the SBL source, while "!SBL" will fetch ads from every source except SBL. required: false schema: type: "string" - name: "orgnr" in: "query" description: | Only fetch ads from the organisation with the given orgnr, or not from the given orgnr if prefixed with "!". "987654321" will only fetch ads from the organisation with orgnr 987654321, while "!987654321" will fetch ads from all organisations exception 987654321. required: false schema: type: "string" - name: "category" in: "query" description: | Only fetch ads for jobs with the given occupation level 1 or level 2 category. Example: "Ledere av undervisning og utdanning". Valid categories can be found here: https://arbeidsplassen-api.nav.no/stillingsimport/api/v1/categories/pyrk/occupations. required: false schema: type: "string" - name: "municipal" in: "query" description: "Only fetch ads from the given municipality, e.g. TRONDHEIM." required: false schema: type: "string" - name: "county" in: "query" description: "Only fetch ads from the given county, e.g. TRØNDELAG." required: false schema: type: "string" responses: '200': description: Found ads content: application/json: schema: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Ads" example: content: - uuid: "2f5db4cc-c9d4-43c1-aa55-57e295194099" published: "2019-05-06T12:27:12.29+02:00" updated: "2019-05-10T12:27:12.29+02:00" expires: "2019-05-20T00:00:00+02:00" workLocations: - country: "NORGE" address: "GATEADRESSE 1" city: "OSLO" postalCode: "0250" county: "OSLO" municipal: "OSLO" title: "Stillingstittel" description: |

Overskrift-eksempel

Stillingstekst

source: "https://www.sourcelink.no/id" applicationDue: "20.05.2019" applicationUrl: "https://application.url/here" occupationCategories: - level1: "Helse og sosial" level2: "Pyskologer og terapeuter" link: "https://arbeidsplassen.nav.no/stillinger/stilling/314f2f5db4cc-c9d4-43c1-aa55-57e295194099" employer: name: "Arbeidsgiver" orgnr: "123456789" homepage: "https://emp-home-page" description: "The employer description" totalElements: 5000 pageNumber: 0 pageSize: 1 totalPages: 5000 first: true last: false sort: "published:desc" servers: - url: 'https://arbeidsplassen.nav.no' servers: - url: 'https://arbeidsplassen.nav.no' components: securitySchemes: bearerAuth: type: "http" scheme: "bearer" bearerFormat: "JWT" schemas: Ads: type: object properties: content: type: array title: List of ads found items: type: object properties: uuid: type: string title: Globally unique ad identifier examples: 2f5db4cc-c9d4-43c1-aa55-57e295194099 published: type: string title: Date and time when ad was published examples: '2019-05-06T12:27:12.29+02:00' updated: type: string title: Date and time of last update on ad examples: '2019-05-07T09:30:12.66+02:00' expires: type: string title: The day the ad expires. Ads are normally shown up to and including this day. examples: '2019-05-20T00:00:00+02:00' workLocations: type: array title: List of work locations items: type: object properties: country: type: string examples: NORGE address: type: string examples: GATEADRESSE 1 city: type: string examples: OSLO postalCode: type: string examples: '0250' county: type: string examples: OSLO municipal: type: string examples: OSLO title: type: string title: Ad heading examples: Annonseoverskrift ! jobtitle: type: string title: Job title examples: Maskinfører description: type: string title: Ad content. HTML formatted examples: |

Overskrift-eksempel

Stillingstekst

...

sourceurl: type: string title: Link to the source from which NAV got the ad examples: https://www.sourcelink.no/id source: type: string title: The source from which NAV got the ad, enumerated applicationDue: type: string examples: 20.05.2019 applicationUrl: type: string title: Link for sending applications examples: https://application.url/here occupationCategories: type: array title: List of occupation categories items: type: object properties: level1: type: string title: First level occupation category (broad) examples: Helse og sosial level2: type: string title: Second level occupation category (higher level of detail) examples: Psykologer og terapeuter link: type: string title: Link to a human readable version of the ad at NAVs pages examples: https://arbeidsplassen.nav.no/stillinger/stilling/314f2f5db4cc-c9d4-43c1-aa55-57e295194099 engagementtype: type: string title: Type of engagement examples: Fast extent: type: string title: Extent of the position examples: Heltid starttime: type: string title: Indicates when the job employee is expected to start examples: Etter avtale positioncount: type: string sector: type: string examples: privat employer: type: object title: Employer data properties: name: type: string examples: NAV orgnr: type: string examples: '123456789' homepage: type: string title: URL to employer home page examples: https://nav.no/ description: type: string title: Description of employer examples: | Arbeids- og velferdsetaten består av den statlige Arbeids- og velferdsetaten (herunder Arbeids- og velferdsdirektoratet) og de delene av kommunenes sosialtjenester som inngår i de felles lokale kontorene. totalElements: type: integer title: Total count of ads found. Max 5000 pageNumber: type: integer title: Page number. Starting with 0 pageSize: type: integer title: Page size. Min 1, max 50 totalPages: type: integer first: type: boolean title: Whether this is the first page last: type: boolean title: Whether this is the last page sort: type: string examples: - published:desc security: - bearerAuth: [] externalDocs: description: github url: "https://github.com/navikt/pam-public-feed"
